posts.title: ⚠️ There's ONLY 57 days until Election Day -- SIGN UP as an Election Worker TODAY! #StopTheSteal
posts.content:
My fellow Patriots!

There's only 57 days until Election Day ... and nobody is coming to save us! Our enemies are prepared and in place to steal this election once again.

We remain at the same disadvantage as we've ever been for that last eight years. Trump isn't Superman. The RNC isn't doing ANYTHING to #StopTheSteal. If our enemies steal this election, there is no lawyer, judge or court that can redeem it. We only get ONE chance on Election Day. If you're NOT applying to be a poll worker, you're part of the problem. YOUR inaction benefits our enemies -- there's ONLY us, We the People, to save this election!

SIGN UP TODAY!

posts.raw_content:
My fellow Patriots!

**There's only 57 days until Election Day** ... and nobody is coming to save us! Our enemies are prepared and in place to steal this election once again. 

We remain at the same disadvantage as we've ever been for that last eight years. Trump isn't Superman. The RNC isn't doing ANYTHING to #StopTheSteal. If our enemies steal this election, there is no lawyer, judge or court that can redeem it. We only get ONE chance on Election Day. If you're NOT applying to be a poll worker, you're part of the problem. YOUR inaction benefits our enemies -- there's ONLY us, **We the People**, to save this election!

**SIGN UP TODAY!**

posts.author: JTIM

linkEmbed.description: Mojave town protests solar energy project as crews chainsaw hundreds of protected Joshua trees
linkEmbed.title: As crews chainsaw Joshua trees, Mojave Desert community protests solar energy project

twitter.content: Crews have begun chainsawing and shredding thousands of protected Joshua trees to make way for a sprawling solar field in the Mojave Desert. Century-old trees become a pile of dust. “Once the trees go through the shredders, they vanish”

posts.author: Tcrussell

twitter.content:
Distressing—depressing—alarming.

After everything—after January 6th, after clear evidence a second term would be far more authoritarian than the first, after the ever-increasing radicalization of MAGA world—Trump now has more support than he had in 2016 or 2020.
